response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product embodies innovation, efficiency, and unparalleled performance, making it an invaluable asset for anyone seeking excellence in their field. Given its unique features and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. I am confident that you will find immense value in this investment, and I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this opportunity. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 9500}
